eventName: Come Catastrophes or Wakes of Vultures
storyInfo: The Blacksteel team finally regroups at the diner, exchanging information and doling out responsibilities. In the process, Leone, a local resident, offers to help repair the power plant furnace.

attributes.content: Wh-What?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Hey, Jessica, where you going?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: I need to go find him—
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Jessica?!
...Franka? Laura?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Reporting in. I've confirmed Jessica's location. She was, in fact, at said diner, and her lips are currently covered in oil. Best guess is that she's been getting acquainted with the menu.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Understood. I'm just about finished on my end as well.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Took you long enough, Teacher's Pet. We were starving out here.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: It was hard to find this place. It's in the middle of nowhere.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Well, whatever. Let's just find something to tide us over.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Miss, I'm extremely grateful you brought Miles home, but if you're gonna complain about my cooking, that's a different matter.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Complain? What's there to complain about in this weather? Isn't that right, Laura?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: O-Of course, it's absolutely delicious! Better than anything my mom or grandma ever made, that's for sure!
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Good to hear there are still folks out there who appreciate the craft! So what do they do for a living, sweetie? Are they cooks?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Umm, my mom's a doctor, and my grandma's an engineer. Neither of them know their way around a kitchen... so my dad did all the cooking.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Pffffft... Ahahahahahahaha!
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Hey. Don't you think you're enjoying that a little too much?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: *cough*... Whoa, easy there! I'm eating, see? I'm eating!
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Excuse me... Ma'am, do you have anything to drink? I'd like a glass of water.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Sure thing, just a moment.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Picking up a random empty glass on the table, the restaurant owner throws open the window and scoops up a cupful of thick snow.
Give it a bit to melt, and then it'll be drinkable.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: By the way, Captain, did you ever find out why we met up with someone from the bank?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: The government here is barely functional and doesn't have the capacity to interface with us, so they left the matter entirely to the bank.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: They left it to who?! Well, what did the folks at the bank say?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: It roughly boils down to two things: We'll have their full support, and the details will be discussed at a later date.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Tch, sounds like we've got our work cut out for us. But you're not the type to come here to eat your sorrows away, right?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: They're lacking in supplies and manpower, but they do have money.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Money's the one thing we're not short on, though. That said... assuming the bank keeps their word, what do you think about hiring on a few of the locals?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Ever since the power plant incident, most of the people on this plate have chosen to leave. It's hard to say how many able-bodied workers are left.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: That explains how few lights are on outside. It's barely eight o'clock!
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: To be honest, we don't need that many people either. I can handle the repair work with just my team. What we really need is someone with a deep understanding of the situation in the energy tower. Is the bank offering any good candidates?
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Nope.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: About that... * cough*, *cough*.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Sir?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I was so busy fixing up your communicator that I forgot to introduce myself.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: The name's Leone Theremin, a blast engineer from the local mine. Pleased to meet ya.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: A blast engineer from the mine... Why are you still here, after all this time?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Hah, a few of us stubborn old farts refused to leave. I've been in this mine since I was four. Wouldn't know how to live anywhere else.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: When the plant first started having problems back then, I took a team down there to deal with it. Though we never managed to fix it entirely, we did get it up and running for a while.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: I'm impressed. It's still working to this day.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Eh, that's all in the past now. Nothing worth mentioning. But, how would I be paid for this exactly...?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Oh, that... The commission's supposed to be completed ASAP, so we're not paid per diem. Only the required room and board expenses are covered.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: After the plant is repaired, we'll be paid in a lump sum. The faster we get it done, the bigger the reward.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Of course, we can also offer you a portion of the payment in advance, in the interest of cooperation.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: And how much are we talking here?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: You'll be treated as a consultant. If we can get the job done in two months, you'll get 40,000. In a month, twice that. In a week—
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Twice that again?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: A bit more than that. You'll be able to earn yourself a solid 200 grand.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Deal!
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Didn't even think twice, huh?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I ain't turning down 200 grand.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Sure, but where would you even spend that kind of cash here?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Depends how old you are. For a young guy, 200 grand is enough to eat, drink, and play to your heart's content, but when you're my age it's just another drop in the bucket called debt.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: ...Debt? Are you in debt?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Not just me. Everyone left here is in debt. *sigh*... How do I put this? Well, I'll just give it to you straight.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: You asked about a guy who walked out into the snowfield earlier, right? It's probably 'cause of his debts... That kinda stuff happens all the time here. After being forced into bankruptcy, he had no choice but to...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Walk straight into the snowfield, with nothing on him...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: ...What are the odds he's still alive? I knew I should've stopped him. If we go looking for him right now, can we still save him?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: *sigh*... That ain't even worth thinking about. It's too late.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: It's not your fault, Jessica.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Ahem. So, Laura, is there anything you'd like to discuss with Mr. Theremin?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Oh, right... Come back here tomorrow to meet up with us, sir. If you have any materials, bring them with you too.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Alright, no problem. I know a few miners too, and they can also—
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: That won't be necessary. You're enough.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Don't be like that. Can't hurt to recruit a few more. Put yourself in our shoes. All the able-bodied folks are gone, and the only people left are...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Old farts like me.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Thanks for coming to see me, Benny. I'll be fine though, so head on home. Stay out any later, and Leone's gonna be worried sick about you again.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: I still haven't finished my writing exercises... Besides, I don't want to go home. Dad is... Never mind.
attributes.name: Benny

attributes.content: I know Leone's got a bit of a temper, but even after all these years, his feelings for you have never—
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: I understand all that, but...
attributes.name: Benny

attributes.content: *sigh*... You warm enough? Should I throw a few more logs onto the fire?
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Don't worry, it's fine... By the way, about those people who brought you home today. Was that the same Blacksteel squad that rescued you?
attributes.name: Benny

attributes.content: Yup. They're here to help us fix the energy tower. When it's all up and running and the heat's working again, we won't even need this fireplace.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: But even if the tower can be fixed up... That doesn't mean the plate will come back to life.
attributes.name: Benny

attributes.content: ...You're gonna go bald early if you keep worrying about crap like that.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Someone has to worry about it, because Dad sure won't. And who else is going to? There was Carl, but he's gone now too.
attributes.name: Benny

attributes.content: Benny...
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Miles! Are you there, Miles? Thank goodness, I found us a great job! We can fix up the power plant and make piles of cash while we're at it!
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Dad? What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Benny

attributes.content: Oh, you were here, Benny?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Well, you can stay and keep studying. I need to take Miles to go meet those Blacksteel girls—
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: I already met them. They're the ones who rescued me.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Hah, me and my memory.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Did you already ask the others?
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: ...I asked all over town. They're either already gone, getting ready to leave, or have given up altogether.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: You and I are the only ones still willing to put in the work on that plant.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: The safe house isn't expected to be completely ready for use until tomorrow night, so we'll be establishing this as our temporary rendezvous point.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Laura, as of tomorrow, the engineering team will be under your command. We must restore this plate's mobility as soon as possible.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: No problemo.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: As for Franka and Jessica, I have some odd jobs for the two of you. I need one person to come with me to pay the bank another visit. And the other...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Needs to head to the outskirts of the plate to make a security assessment. Employees from the bank have said that bandits occasionally come from out there.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: C-Can I volunteer to head to the outskirts?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Sure, why not? Which means I'll be going with ol' Liskarm here to see just how big of a headache these bank people are gonna be.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Everyone, please note that while most of the tower is basically safe due to the active Originium dust settling down over a long period of time, there are still areas where the index exceeds standard values.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: I've already synced your devices with the specific danger zones.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: This will be a hot repair, as the tower is still in operation, albeit at low output. So please pay attention to your personal safety, and report any accidents ASAP.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Thanks, you two. You saved us a lot of time poking around at the danger zones one by one.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: I've worked here for most of my life. This place's more my home than that crappy room in the underpass.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Then sorry in advance for making a bit of a mess.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Wouldn't have it any other way.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Gah—!
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: ...It's so badly damaged, but it's still burning? This is practically a miracle.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Miles and I reinforced the furnace a few years back, both to prevent accidents and to let it burn things other than Originium fuel.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Heh. The first time a winter like this struck, we still had some leftover Originium products lying around. But later we were lucky to have wood to burn.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: As for now... all we can do is assess the situation.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Team A is in place. Everyone else, report your location and status. We'll begin diagnostics in one minute.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Team B in place. Visual inspection shows approximately thirty percent damage to the combined cycle unit.
attributes.name: Communicator

attributes.content: Team C in place. The cooling system is completely wrecked, but since it's so cold outside we can throw together a makeshift air-cooling system.
attributes.name: Communicator

attributes.content: Team D in place. The ash-discharging airduct is operating normally. We'll adjust our pace depending on the other teams' needs.
attributes.name: Communicator

attributes.content: Well then, everyone—
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: —Let's get to work.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Captain, I've arrived at the last patrol point.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Any sign of bandits along the way?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: No... I drove all the way out here without seeing anything.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Franka and I will be entering talks with the bank shortly. Be careful.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: If you encounter any problems, contact us immediately. Don't worry about inconveniencing us. Do you understand?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Roger that.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Helena said that Woodrow often passes by here after hunting... I don't know if I'll be able to meet him today.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Why does it... smell like pine oil here?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Pine branches... Did someone start a fire?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Someone's been through here, but who? Could it be Woodrow coming back to the plate?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: *huff*... W-Woodrow, wait for me!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Someone else is back there...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Oh no!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Woodrow, watch out!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Who's there?! Well shit, you've brought more bad news.
attributes.name: Sneaky Snowfield Bandit

attributes.content: ...What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Sir, there might be bandits roaming in the area. You should head back to safety on the plate as soon as you can.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Um, why do you look so angry?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: You sure know how to be a pain in the rear.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: But that man behind you just tried to snipe you... I came here to save you...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: You have any idea how hard it was to lure that guy out? And now, all that evidence is down the drain, thanks to your bullet.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: O-Oh no... Sorry, I...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: A-Are you investigating something? Maybe I can help you somehow, to make up for it?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Okay, now that you know there are bandits out here, ever thought about what they might be after?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Probably looting supplies... Since it's tough getting by around here?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: We can barely keep ourselves fed and clothed on the plate. You think they want our scraps? Their M.O. is to ambush and rob caravans.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Th-Then, what are they after here?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Lately, a bunch of people from the plate have gone missing. And my witnesses tell me some of 'em have been seen talking to bandits here before they vanished...
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: So my question to you is this: what're you doing here?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: I... I was assigned to maintain security along the plate's outskirts, and ensure that any bandits wandering the perimeter don't interfere with the power plant's repair.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: All on your lonesome?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: No... I have teammates. Besides, aren't you also here?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Whatever. Bye.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Wait! The bullet—
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Oh, he's already gone...
attributes.name: Jessica
